section.title: What is Weld-OSGi ?
section.para: Weld-OSGi aims at simplifying the access to the OSGi environment by providing a more modern, more user-friendly and faster way to interact with the OSGi Framework. It addresses the OSGi complexity of services management using CDI specification (JSR-299). Thus it provides an CDI-OSGi extension with injection utilities for the OSGi environment. Moreover an integration with any CDI implementation, such as Weld, is possible through a standard bootstrapping API.
